title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set immediately, changes are made unexpectedly.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered.
EB: The working set should be removed without making any changes to the package view or the selected project.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Open the working set dialog again.
3. Create a second working set.
4. Delete the first working set.
